text: Michael Joseph Bowers (born October 7, 1941) is an American politician and lawyer. He was the Attorney General of Georgia from 1981 to 1997. He unsuccessfully ran for governor in 1996. Bowers was a Democrat through 1994, at which time he joined the Republican Party. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Georgia (U.S. state) attorneys general Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Mike Bowers
